summary: A collection of PyTorch components that implement the DimeNet and DimeNet++ graph neural network architectures for modeling atomic structures. It includes custom activations, radial and angular basis generators, smooth cutoff envelopes, learnable embeddings, interaction/message‑passing blocks, residual layers, weight initializers, and output heads, all designed to transform molecular graphs into predictive representations.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to build and train high‑accuracy graph neural networks for predicting molecular and material properties, accelerating discovery and analysis in chemistry, materials science, and related domains.
